title: The recantation and hvmble svbmission of two ancient prelates of the kingdome of Scotland subscribed by their own hands and sent to the generall assemblie : as also the act of the said assemblie condemning episcopacy and other abuses which are contrary to the Word of God and the laws of this church and kingdome.
author: Lindsay, Alexander, ca. 1561-1639.
notes: The two prelates are Alexander Lindsay, Bishop of Dunkeld and G. Grahame, Bishop of Orkney.  Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
